QuestData.Title: Breaking the Emperor's Shield
QuestData.Description: The Mogu have been scattered and sparse in number for many years. Their purpose in the valley makes sense now.$b$bWith this many restless spirits they can build themselves an army using the guardians buried in each tomb. Combined with the Zandalari forces this would be devastating!$b$bThe Tomb of Secrets houses elite warriors called the Emperor's Shield. They must not be resurrected! You'll find the tomb on the highest rise to the southwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop the Spiritbinding Ritual in the Tomb of Secrets.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you gone to the Tomb of Secrets yet?
QuestData.RewardText: The Mogu and the Zandalari intend to resurrect the Thunder King?!$b$bWe cannot let this happen, $n! The Thunder King will rain destruction on this land with his return.
